Monologue.Current: // После вечеринки{Line}{Char Quistis}{Line}“{Char Squall}, I was just wondering...{Line} Have you fought T-Rexaur in the{Line} training center?”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, I was just wondering...{Line} Have you fought T-Rexaur in the{Line} training center?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“You can defeat it quite easily by{Line} using {Color Blue}〖Status-J〗{Color White}.”{Next}“Let’s go over Status changes{Line} in the Tutorial!”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“You can defeat it quite easily by{Line} using {Color Blue}〖Status-J〗{Color White}.”{Next}“Let’s go over Status changes{Line} in the Tutorial!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Well?”{Next}“Use a Sleep attack against T-Rexaur.{Line} Just junction ‘Sleep’ onto your{Line} ST Atk-J and attack.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Well?”{Next}“Use a Sleep attack against T-Rexaur.{Line} Just junction ‘Sleep’ onto your{Line} ST Atk-J and attack.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Come on, let’s go to the ‘secret area’.{Line} It’s just inside the training center.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Come on, let’s go to the ‘secret area’.{Line} It’s just inside the training center.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Weren’t you listening?”{Next}“I thought I told you to{Line} get changed...”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Weren’t you listening?”{Next}“I thought I told you to{Line} get changed...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“{Char Squall}.{Line} It’s not like everyone{Line} can get by on their own, you know?”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}.{Line} It’s not like everyone{Line} can get by on their own, you know?”

Monologue.Current: Первый студент{Line}“Фух! Твою мать!..{Line} Думал - сдохну!..”
Monologue.Original: Student A{Line}“AHH! I thought I was about to die!”

Monologue.Current: Второй студент{Line}“Значит, об этом чудище все говорили...”
Monologue.Original: Student B{Line}“So that’s the infamous monster...”
Student A{Line}“I’d be careful{Line} if I were you.”

Monologue.Current: Второй студент{Line}“Там всего два вида монстров.{Line} Мухоловки и... этот... Чёрт, да как{Line} с ним вообще можно справиться?!”
Monologue.Original: Student B{Line}“There’s basically 2 monsters to a set.{Line} Kinda tough for students like us.{Line} We’re not even SeeDs yet.”

Monologue.Current: “Только тяжёлые тренировки{Line} помогают расти над собой.”
Monologue.Original: “Actually, it’s this heavy tension{Line} that gives me such a rush...”
“Fighting like this{Line} keeps you in shape.”
